text: Northwest Park (Manchester) is a baseball field located in Manchester, Connecticut, United States. The field is the former home of the Manchester Silkworms of the New England Collegiate Baseball League. It played host to the Silkworms between 2000 and 2009.http://www.manchestersilkworms.org/ Manchester Silkworms homepage The field's location places Union Pond behind a stand of trees located past the outfield.https://maps.google.com/maps?rls=com.microsoft:en-us:IE- SearchBox&ie;=UTF-8&oe;=UTF-8&sourceid;=ie7&rlz;=1I7GGLF_en&um;=1&q;=Northwest+Park,+Manchester,+Ct&fb;=1&cid;=0,0,896085622389284767&sa;=X&oi;=local_result&resnum;=1&ct;=image GoogleMaps satellite ==External links== * Manchester Silkworms website * NECBL website ==Notes== Category:New England Collegiate Baseball League ballparks Category:Baseball venues in Connecticut
title: Northwest Park (Manchester)
